trans-unit.source: Provides methods used to render a tab control with visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer> class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a tab control with the current visual style of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer> classe fornece um conjunto de `static` métodos que podem ser usados para renderizar um controle guia com o estilo visual atual do sistema operacional.

trans-unit.source: Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control.
trans-unit.target: Renderizar um controle refere-se a desenhar a interface do usuário de um controle.

trans-unit.source: This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil se você estiver desenhando um controle personalizado que deve ter a aparência do estilo visual atual.

trans-unit.source: To draw a tab control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabPage%2A> method to draw the page, and use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabItem%2A> method to draw each tab.
trans-unit.target: Para desenhar um controle guia, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabPage%2A> método para desenhar a página e use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabItem%2A> método para desenhar cada guia.

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, the methods of this class will draw the tab control with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: Se esses estilos estejam habilitados no sistema operacional e estilos visuais são aplicados à área de cliente do aplicativo windows, os métodos dessa classe desenhará o controle de guia com o estilo visual atual.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the methods and properties of this class will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os métodos e as propriedades dessa classe lançará um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the members of this class can be used, check the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar se os membros dessa classe podem ser usados, verifique o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This class wraps the functionality of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer?displayProperty=nameWithType> that is set to one of the elements exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Tab?displayProperty=nameWithType> class.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe encapsula a funcionalidade de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer?displayProperty=nameWithType> está definido como um dos elementos expostos pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Tab?displayProperty=nameWithType> classe.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [renderização de controles com estilos visuais](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabPage%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabItem%2A> methods to draw a basic tab control with two tabs.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar um controle personalizado que usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabPage%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabItem%2A> métodos para desenhar um controle guia básico com duas guias.

trans-unit.source: Draws a tab that is used to select a page in the tab control.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the tab.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the bounds of the tab.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TabItemState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the tab.
Draws a tab in the specified state and bounds.
Before calling this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Antes de chamar esse método, você deve verificar se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A> propriedade retorna `true`.

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support visual styles.
-or-
Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or-
Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the tab.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the bounds of the tab.
<see langword="true" /> to draw a focus rectangle; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TabItemState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the tab.
Draws a tab in the specified state and bounds, and with an optional focus rectangle.
Before calling this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Antes de chamar esse método, você deve verificar se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A> propriedade retorna `true`.

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support visual styles.
-or-
Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or-
Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the tab.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the bounds of the tab.
The <see cref="T:System.String" /> to draw in the tab.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to apply to <c>tabItemText</c>.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TabItemState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the tab.
Draws a tab in the specified state and bounds, and with the specified text.
Before calling this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Antes de chamar esse método, você deve verificar se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A> propriedade retorna `true`.

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support visual styles.
-or-
Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or-
Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the tab.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the bounds of the tab.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw in the tab.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the bounds of <c>image</c>.
<see langword="true" /> to draw a focus rectangle; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TabItemState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the tab.
Draws a tab in the specified state and bounds, with the specified image, and with an optional focus rectangle.
Before calling this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Antes de chamar esse método, você deve verificar se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A> propriedade retorna `true`.

The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the tab.

The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to apply to <c>tabItemText</c>.
<see langword="true" /> to draw a focus rectangle; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TabItemState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the tab.
Draws a tab in the specified state and bounds, with the specified text, and with an optional focus rectangle.
Before calling this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Antes de chamar esse método, você deve verificar se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A> propriedade retorna `true`.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabItem%28System.Drawing.Graphics%2CSystem.Drawing.Rectangle%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TabItemState%29> method in a custom control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> method to draw a tab item.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabItem%28System.Drawing.Graphics%2CSystem.Drawing.Rectangle%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TabItemState%29> método em um controle personalizado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> método para desenhar um item de guia.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer> classe.

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support visual styles.
-or-
Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or-
Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the tab.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the bounds of the tab.
The <see cref="T:System.String" /> to draw in the tab.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to apply to <c>tabItemText</c>.
A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags" /> values.
<see langword="true" /> to draw a focus rectangle; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TabItemState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the tab.
Draws a tab in the specified state and bounds, with the specified text and text formatting, and with an optional focus rectangle.
Before calling this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Antes de chamar esse método, você deve verificar se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A> propriedade retorna `true`.

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support visual styles.
-or-
Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or-
Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the tab.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the bounds of the tab.
The <see cref="T:System.String" /> to draw in the tab.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to apply to <c>tabItemText</c>.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw in the tab.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the bounds of <c>image</c>.
<see langword="true" /> to draw a focus rectangle; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TabItemState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the tab.
Draws a tab in the specified state and bounds, with the specified text and image, and with an optional focus rectangle.
Before calling this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Antes de chamar esse método, você deve verificar se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A> propriedade retorna `true`.

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support visual styles.
-or-
Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or-
Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the tab.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the bounds of the tab.
The <see cref="T:System.String" /> to draw in the tab.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to apply to <c>tabItemText</c>.
A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags" /> values.

The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the bounds of <c>image</c>.
<see langword="true" /> to draw a focus rectangle; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TabItemState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the tab.
Draws a tab in the specified state and bounds; with the specified text, text formatting, and image; and with an optional focus rectangle.
Before calling this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support visual styles.
-or-
Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or-
Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the tab page.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the bounds of the tab page.
Draws a tab page in the specified bounds.
Before calling this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Antes de chamar esse método, você deve verificar se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A> propriedade retorna `true`.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabPage%2A> method in a custom control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> method to draw a tab page.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabPage%2A> método em um controle personalizado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> método para desenhar uma página da guia.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer> classe.

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support visual styles.
-or-
Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or-
Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer" /> class can be used to draw a tab control with visual styles.
<see langword="true" /> if the user has enabled visual styles in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o usuário habilitou estilos visuais no sistema operacional e estilos visuais são aplicados à área de cliente do windows do aplicativo. Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabPage%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabItem%2A> methods will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade for `false`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabPage%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabItem%2A> métodos lançará um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property to determine whether to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabPage%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabItem%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A> propriedade para determinar se deve usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabPage%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabItem%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer> classe.
